performance_metrics.name: Signal Throughput (Hz)
performance_metrics.description: The maximum frequency range the system can process continuously without significant degradation. Measured in Hertz (Hz). Represents the number of signals the system can handle simultaneously.

performance_metrics.name: Latency (ms)
performance_metrics.description: The delay between the input signal and the processed output. Crucial for real-time applications. Measured in milliseconds (ms). Lower latency is generally preferred.

performance_metrics.name: Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR) (dB)
performance_metrics.description: The ratio between the desired signal and the background noise. Higher SNR indicates a cleaner signal. Measured in decibels (dB).

performance_metrics.name: Processing Accuracy (%)
performance_metrics.description: The percentage of correctly processed signals. Represents the reliability of the system's output. Measured as a percentage.

performance_metrics.name: Resource Utilization (CPU/RAM)
performance_metrics.description: The percentage of system resources utilized during peak operation. Lower is preferable for efficient scaling and reduced infrastructure costs. Measured as a percentage.

performance_metrics.name: Processing Speed (Operations/second)
performance_metrics.description: Number of signal processing operations performed per second.  Higher values indicate faster processing capabilities.

implementation_requirements.name: Hardware Specifications
implementation_requirements.specifications: FPGA-based processing unit with 128+ cores, 1 TB RAM, 16 TB SSD storage, redundant power supplies, and a dedicated network interface (10 Gigabit Ethernet or faster). Operating temperature range: 18-27°C.
implementation_requirements.description: The core processing unit should provide sufficient compute power and memory to handle the specified throughput and accuracy requirements.

implementation_requirements.name: Software Architecture
implementation_requirements.specifications: Modular software design with real-time operating system (RTOS) for deterministic processing. Support for industry-standard signal processing libraries (e.g., FFTW, OpenCV).  API for integration with other systems.
implementation_requirements.description: A robust and adaptable software architecture is crucial for maintainability, scalability, and integration.

implementation_requirements.name: Network Connectivity
implementation_requirements.specifications: 10 Gigabit Ethernet or higher for data transfer. Secure communication protocols (TLS/SSL) for data integrity and security. Redundant network connections for high availability.
implementation_requirements.description: Reliable and secure network connectivity is vital for data transfer and system communication.

implementation_requirements.name: Calibration and Testing
implementation_requirements.specifications: Regular calibration procedures using traceable standards. Comprehensive testing protocol including signal distortion analysis, noise level measurement, and throughput verification.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensuring accuracy and performance requires rigorous testing and calibration procedures.

implementation_requirements.name: Safety Standards
implementation_requirements.specifications: Compliance with relevant IEC standards (IEC 61508, IEC 61513) depending on application and safety criticality.
implementation_requirements.description: Appropriate safety measures and adherence to industry best practices are paramount.

industry_standards: IEC 61162-2: Functional Safety – Part 2: Diagnostic Coverage
IEC 61508: Functional Safety of Electrical/Electronic/Programmable Electronic Safety-related Systems
IEC 61513: Functional Safety Requirements for Control Systems
ISO 13346-1: Metrological traceability – Part 1: Application to mass and force measurements
ANSI/ISA-70.100-2014: Standard for the Use of Programmable Electronic Control Systems
operational_considerations: Regular Maintenance: Implement a preventative maintenance schedule including component replacement and software updates.
Data Logging and Monitoring: Continuously monitor system performance metrics and log relevant data for analysis and troubleshooting.
Operator Training: Provide comprehensive training to operators on system operation, maintenance, and troubleshooting.
Security Hardening: Implement robust security measures to protect against unauthorized access and cyber threats.
Scalability Planning: Design the system with scalability in mind to accommodate future growth and increased demand.

input.system_message: You are an AI assistant specialized in industrial engineering and specifications. For the given topic, provide a comprehensive overview of industrial/commercial specifications including performance metrics and implementation requirements. Be precise with numerical values and include ranges where appropriate. Focus on practical technical details that would be relevant to professionals in the field.
input.user_message:
Create detailed industrial specifications for: Automated Signal Processing

Format your response as a JSON object with these categories:
1. performance_metrics: An array of metrics with names, values/ranges, and descriptions
2. implementation_requirements: An array of requirements with names, specifications, and descriptions
3. industry_standards: An array of relevant standards and certifications
4. key_suppliers: An array of major equipment/technology suppliers for this industry
5. operational_considerations: An array of important operational factors

Please provide realistic values for industrial/commercial scale implementations.

Return ONLY valid JSON without any additional text, explanation, or code block formatting.
